manager.title: Manage Studies
manager.browse-text: for a study to work with.

import-entry-details.title: Import Entry Details
import-entry-details.template.download.instruction: Provide a file with either the GID, the GUID or the DESIGNATION of the germplasm to include in the list. If you provide multiple values for a record the system will use the following order: GUID, GID, DESIGNATION for retrieval.

file.input.description: Choose the file you would like to import in format: Excel

validation.file.empty: Wrong name for Observation sheet or the file has no data. Please verify and try again
validation.extensions: Only the following file extensions are allowed: {{param}}
validation.header: At least GID, GUID or DESIGNATION column is required
validation.gid.format: Some GID values are not a positive integer. Please correct them and try again
validation.unknown.column: Some columns were not recognized in the system or are not relevant to the import list and were thus ignored ({{param}})
validation.entry.details.no.column: No suitable column found for entry detail variables. Please check the Entry Details sheet
validation.entry.no.format: Some ENTRY_NO values are not a positive integer. Please correct them and try again
validation.entry.no.duplicates: Some ENTRY_NO values are duplicated. Please correct them and try again
validation.entry.no.incorrect: ENTRY_NO value for entry #: {{param}} is incorrect. Please correct it and try again
validation.entry.no.missing: Missing ENTRY_NO value for entry #: {{param}}. Please correct it and try again

import-entry-details.cancel.confirm: Are you sure you want to quit the import process?
import-entry-details.confirmation: You are going to import {{param}} entry updates. Proceed?
import-entry-details.no-entries-values: There are no entry values available to import.
